name: James Patterson's 'Suzanne's Diary For Nicholas' Quiz | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: How old was Suzanne when she had her first heart attack?
questions.explanation:
35.

	Suzanne was walking her dog in the Boston Public Park when she had her first heart attack. While in the hospital, she had coronary bypass surgery.

questions.text: When Suzanne moved to Martha's Vineyard, what was the nickname of the man that fixed her house?
questions.explanation:
Picasso.

	Picasso's real name was Matt Harrison. He was six foot two with sandy brown hair. He brought Suzanne flowers the first day he worked on her house.

questions.text: On what holiday were Matt and Suzanne married?
questions.explanation:
New Year's Eve.

	Matt and Suzanne were married on Martha's Vineyard and had a three week honeymoon. They spent two weeks on two different islands in Hawaii and the third week at home.

questions.text: Why did Matt and Suzanne name their son Nicholas?
options: He was named after Matt's father
Because he was born on Christmas Day
questions.explanation:
It doesn't say.

	Suzanne had Nicholas by C-section on July 18 because she was having trouble with the pregnancy. They nicknamed the baby the warrior because of how strong he was.

questions.text: What occasion were Matt, Suzanne, and Nicholas celebrating when Nicholas and Suzanne were killed?
options: Suzanne's new home office being finished
questions.explanation:
Nicholas' birthday.

	Suzanne took Nicholas with her when she went to pick up the pictures of their vacation. On their way to the photography place, Suzanne had a massive heart attack and the car went into the water. Suzanne died instantly from her heart attack.

questions.text: How did Matt meet Katie Wilkinson?
options: Katie moved into his old house
They were old high school friends
questions.explanation:
She was his editor.

	Katie and Matt met when she started editing his book of poetry. They fell in love and then Matt broke up with her and left her a diary of Suzanne's to explain why he broke up with her.

questions.text: How long had Suzanne and Nicholas been gone when Matt broke up with Katie?
questions.explanation:
2 years.

	Katie didn't realize the significance of the day Matt broke up with her until she saw the date of Suzanne and Nicholas' death. On the day Matt broke up with Katie, Suzanne and Nicholas had been dead two years.

questions.text: When Katie went to Martha's Vineyard, what was not one of the things she did?
options: Go to Suzanne and Nicholas' grave
questions.explanation:
See Matt.

	After reading the diary, Katie went to Martha's Vineyard to find Matt, but she never saw him. Instead, she met their next door neighbor Melanie, who took her back to the ferry so she could go back to New York.

questions.text: After returning to New York, who did Katie see across the street from her place of business?
questions.explanation:
Matt.

	Katie saw Matt across the street from her publishing house a week after she returned from Martha's Vineyard. Matt proposed to her while on his knees on the street and Katie accepted.

questions.text: Did Katie and Matt have a baby?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Katie was pregnant when Matt broke up with her and she was going to tell him that night. When she finally did tell him, he was happy and they were married on Martha's Vineyard.
